column1: A town or eup is an administrative unit in South Korea; along with township (rural)
column2: a town (urban) is one of the divisions of a county
column3: and of some cities with a population of less than 500
column4: 000.  The main town or towns in a county—or the secondary town or towns within a city's territory—are designated as towns. Towns are subdivided into villages. In order to form a town
